headline.print_headline: Tibco Merger Vote Can Proceed Despite $100 Million Error: Judge
headline.main: Tibco Merger Vote Can Proceed Despite $100 Million Error: Judge

lead_paragraph: Tibco Software Inc can proceed with a shareholder vote next week on its proposed $4.2 billion buyout by private equity firm Vista Equity Partners, despite an erroneous share count that initially overvalued the deal by $100 million, a Delaware judge said.
